article_title: An Idea Whose Time Has Come

article_metadata.description: None of the ACA penalties even begins to match the cost the Obama administration threatens to impose on employers who give employees the one kind of health insurance they seem to most want.
article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman

og.title: Portable Health Insurance: An Idea Whose Time Has Come
